markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Plains](/Rules.aspx?ID=611)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 514 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The plains environment encompasses grasslands such as savannas and farmland. The most common disasters in plains are tornadoes and wildfires.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-612" />

<document level="2" id="rules-613" />
name: Plains
